entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dauphin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:03 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.1°C

Observed at: Dauphin Airport 09:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
